entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
